email_chain.subject: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Jason,

Hope this email finds you well.

We have a prompt vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao. The vessel PACIFIC STAR is workable, with a laycan of 15-20 October. Indicative freight rate is $22.50/MT, CFR terms.

Let me know if this is of interest.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thanks for the offer. Can you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, we're looking at a cargo size of 180,000MT, plus or minus 10%. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you sharpen it?

Best,
Jason Lee
Bulk Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Jason,

The PACIFIC STAR has a DWT of 205,000 and an LOA of 300m. I can bring the rate down to $21.75/MT, CFR terms. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Laura,

$21.75 is still a bit high. We're seeing rates closer to $21.00 in the market. Can you match that?

Best,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Jason,

I can do $21.25/MT, but that's the best I can offer. The vessel is in high demand, and the laycan is tight. Let me know if you can proceed at this rate.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Laura,

$21.25 works for us. Please confirm the laycan and send over the recap.

Best,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - Prompt Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Jason,

Confirmed. Laycan remains 15-20 October. Recap will follow shortly.

Best regards,
Laura
